sn22.38:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.38:2.2: ‘katamesaṃ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha?
sn22.38:2.3: Katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati?
sn22.38:2.4: Katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.38:2.5: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, ānanda, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.38:2.7: ‘katamesaṃ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha?
sn22.38:2.8: Katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati?
sn22.38:2.9: Katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.38:2.11: ‘yaṃ kho, āvuso, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ;
sn22.38:2.12: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.14: tassā uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitāya aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.17: tesaṃ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.19: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.20: Imesaṃ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:3.1: Yaṃ kho, āvuso, rūpaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ;
sn22.38:3.2: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.4: tassā uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitāya aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.7: tesaṃ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.9: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.10: Imesaṃ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:4.1: Yaṃ kho, āvuso, rūpaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ;
sn22.38:4.2: tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
sn22.38:4.6: tesaṃ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
sn22.38:4.7: Yaṃ viññāṇaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
sn22.38:4.8: Imesaṃ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī’ti.
sn22.38:5.2: Yaṃ kho, ānanda, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ;
sn22.38:5.3: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:5.8: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:5.9: Imesaṃ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:6.1: Yaṃ kho, ānanda, rūpaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ;
sn22.38:6.2: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:6.7: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:6.8: Imesaṃ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:7.1: Yaṃ kho, ānanda, rūpaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ;
sn22.38:7.2: tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
sn22.38:7.7: tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
sn22.38:7.8: Imesaṃ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṃ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti.
sn22.38:7.9: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ byākareyyāsī”ti.
